name: Empires of the Undergrowth
description: Ant colony management game, in a fast-paced real-time strategy style. The player excavates their nest underground, constructing tunnels and chambers to store food and raise brood. On the surface, the ants claim territory, gather resources, overwhelm fearsome arachnids and clash with other colonies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or higher Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
